title: Ep 55: Feel The Burnout with Anne Helen Petersen
itunes:title: Ep 55: Feel The Burnout with Anne Helen Petersen
itunes:subtitle: This week, Doree and Kate do a product check-in and discuss the skincare and makeup stuff they’re into right now. Plus, Kate tries to master meal-planning, Doree continues her closet purge, and they get heated about 90’s diet fads and low-fat foods.Th...
description:
This week, Doree and Kate do a product check-in and discuss the skincare and makeup stuff they’re into right now. Plus, Kate tries to master meal-planning, Doree continues her closet purge, and they get heated about 90’s diet fads and low-fat foods.

Then they welcome Anne Helen Petersen, author, journalist, and senior culture writer at Buzzfeed News. She discusses her viral essay, “How Millennials Became The Burnout Generation”, the performance aspect of social media, and the pressure that can come with indulging in self-care.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast,@katespencer,@doree, Twitter:@forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group(password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website,Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

  • Care/of - To get 50% off your first month of Care/of vitamins visit takecareof.com and use promo code FOREVER50.
  • Myro - Visit mymyro.com/forever35 with promo code FOREVER35 to get 50% off your first order and get started for just $5.
  • Pretty Litter - To get 20% off your first order visit prettylitter.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.
